name: Formula1.com F1 Access Live Timing
description: Improves the display of formula1.com "F1 Access" live timing pages: larger font size, header and footer of the page removed, (more readable) monospace font, adapted margins to maximize the full screen display.
additional_info:
#Usage

Install the style, go to http://www.formula1.com/en/f1-live.html, turn the fullscreen on, and the experience should be less crappy.

# Releases notes

 * 2021-03-26 - remove all instances of the advert from the top of the live timing
 * 2021-03-12 - removed the terrible advert from the top of the live timing
 * 2019-03-17 - removed some margins to maximize timing display
 * 2016-04-02 - fixed timings page display (new layout with new season)
 * 2015-04-12 - fixed race display (timings table header during the race)
 * 2015-04-11 - initial release
